values.value: Retrieves records from Salesforce based on filters

üîç GetRecords Action

This action retrieves records from Salesforce using SOQL queries based on filters.

Backend Configuration

  • objectApiName (String): The Salesforce object to query (required, auto-populated)
  • defaultFields (Array): Default fields to retrieve (e.g., ["Id", "Name", "CreatedDate"])
  • maxReturnToLLM (Number): Maximum records to return to AI (default: 10)

Parameters (AI will provide)

  • filters (Object): Key-value pairs for WHERE clause (e.g., {"Status": "Active"})
  • additionalFields (Array): Extra fields to retrieve beyond defaults
  • limit (Number): Maximum number of records to return
  • orderBy (String): Sort order (e.g., "CreatedDate DESC")
